statements: SELECT player_name, total_points FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE games_played > 10;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_name, average_score FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE total_points >= 1000 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_points FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE average_score < 50 ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, average_score FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE games_played BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY games_played DESC, average_score ASC;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformance ORDER BY player_name ASC, games_played DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_points, average_score FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE average_score >= 8.0;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_points FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE total_points BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY games_played ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformance WHERE average_score < 6.0 AND games_played >= 30 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_score FROM player_metrics;
SELECT player_name, games_played, average_score FROM player_metrics WHERE games_played > 10;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, improvement_areas FROM performance_analysis;
SELECT player_id, analysis_date, improvement_areas, development_areas FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, average_score FROM player_metrics WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT player_name, total_score, average_score FROM player_metrics WHERE total_score BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_score
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score, average_score FROM player_metrics WHERE average_score < 80 AND games_played > 100 ORDER BY average_score
SELECT player_name, analysis_date, improvement_areas, development_areas FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score, average_score FROM player_metrics WHERE games_played > 50 OR average_score < 70 ORDER BY games_played DESC, total_score ASC
SELECT player_id, metric_name, metric_value, time_recorded FROM player_metrics;
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT score, level_completed FROM player_scores WHERE date_completed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 456;
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 789;
SELECT player_id, metric_name, metric_value, time_recorded FROM player_metrics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, score, level_completed, date_completed FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_id, feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'accuracy' AND metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT player_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM player_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%kills%' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games;
SELECT player_id, game_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT player_id, player_name, log_message FROM players JOIN player_logs ON players.player_id = player_logs.player_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_logs.log_message FROM players LEFT JOIN player_logs ON players.player_id = player_logs.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, log_message, log_date FROM players JOIN player_logs ON players.player_id = player_logs.player_id;
SELECT game_name, genre, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM games JOIN player_scores ON games.game_id = player_scores.game_id GROUP BY game_name, genre;
SELECT * FROM player_info;
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM player_info WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT player_id, player_name, age FROM player_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, gender FROM player_info WHERE age > 20 AND skill_level < 5 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM player_info WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, skill_level FROM player_info WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, date_played, score FROM player_info JOIN game_scores ON player_info.player_id = game_scores.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, training_date, duration_hours, skill_area FROM player_info JOIN player_training ON player_info.player_id = player_training.player_id WHERE skill_area = 'Shooting' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, goal_description, deadline, status FROM player_info JOIN player_goals ON player_info.player_id = player_goals.player_id WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
